publicwhip.spmotion: S3M-4594 Sarah Boyack: Thank You to Ewan Williamson and Lothian and Borders Fire and Rescue Service—That the Parliament records its thanks to firefighter Ewan Williamson and the Lothian and Borders Fire and Rescue Service; salutes the bravery of firefighter Williamson and his colleagues from Lothian and Borders Fire Service who saved more than 20 people from a blaze above the Balmoral Bar in Dalry Road in the early morning of Sunday 12 July 2009; expresses its condolences to firefighter Williamson’s family, and thanks firefighters across the country for the exceptional work they do day in, day out protecting our local communities.
S3M-4594 Thank You to Ewan Williamson and Lothian and Borders Fire and Rescue Service (lodged on 13 July 2009) Jack McConnell*, Jamie Hepburn*, Mike Pringle*
